title: Weather App
description: Created a Weather web app where you can search for weather data of any Indian city and also use your current GPS location to display weather information.

title: Wholemart
description: A clone of the UK-based Belk website, specializing in fashion and home decor. Built with React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Chakra UI.

title: My Glow
description: A clone of the Sugar Cosmetic website, focusing on various cosmetic products. This collaborative project involved 5 members and was built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, and Chakra UI.

title: MediGreen
description: A clone of the Tata 1mg website, specializing in healthcare and pharmaceutical products. Built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, Chakra UI, Express, MongoDB, and Node.js.

title: Groomskart
description: A clone of the Myntra website, focusing on various fashion and style products. This individual project was built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
